column5: I just wanted to wish my northern neighbors a Happy Canada Day!  You'all have a good one!  Cheers
Why thank you Phil, and you have a good one also, in 3 days time. Hope you get out fishing on you're long weekend.  Tom
Thanks Phil, as Tom said, enjoy your upcoming long weekend...  Maureen
Thanks for the well wishes Phil. Very nice of you to remember.
Roy for years I spent Canada Day on Ontario soil/water, always a good time!
Thanks Phil.  All the best to you and I hope you ahve a great weekend and holiday coming up next weekend.  Mike
